title: Behind the Idea #48: View From The Short Side - Kase Learning Shorting Conference Recap
description: We wrap up our Kase Learning Shorting Conference coverage by reviewing the conference. We hit our favorite short ideas, our favorite presentations, key themes, and questions over the aims of investing and short selling and the future of the market.
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: We hit the highlights and themes of the popular shortselling conference
